Some overly frequent disconnect problems, and matchmaking system is currently imbalanced, but at its core a fun game for horror genre fans. Actually playing the villain/dungeon boss role and hunting your victims is an exciting niche concept.
mt bom pena que sou ruim nele

This game sucks. When I play this game and somebody come to my room I rather switch to po*n becasue it is easier to explain.
Reasons? There are a lot of them:
1. Toxic players. Man oh boy oh boy. You will do one small mistake or leave somebody behind and after that ur noob and rat.
2. High ranks matched with lover one. When playing as a survivor, you will most of the time get low rank teammates and rank 1 killer. Welp ur dead and vise versa when playing as killer.
MATCHMAKING IS BROKEN!! It will always be like this: (you) Rank 15 killer< Rank 1-5 survivors, (you) Rank 15 survivor + your team Rank 15 too< Killer Rank 1 UNPLAYABLE!!!!
3. Lags. When u connect to some russians to the lobby u shoud expect that you will be lagging a lot.
4. 90% of the killers cannot be unlocked by playing. Well most of the killers are from famous films and there are some copyright ofcourse but man. When u pay 20 Euros (I bought it for 8 Euros while in sale) u have to pay another 30 to unlock ingame content. Sad.
5. Grinding. To get ONE character to max level its gona take u some time and u need to play good or the time is going to higher a lot.
6. Impossible to win against 4 premades when playing as a killer. :)
Edit:
7. Game constantly crashing or getting error. When in the menu or even in the game. Best when it heppens in the really nice played game (happend to me).
Edit:
8. 3 player quit at the start of the game and hatch spawned right next to the killer, he did not have even that maner let me escape and he instanty killed me game 10/10 really.

Pros: I have fun playing as a survivor and killer (if they are not Rank 1 players with flashlight) or when the killer is not rank 1 and teammates (survivors) are not afk or trolling or toxic.
         Not all characters need u to have dlcs but to get one It is going to take you more than 44 hours (at least).
Edit: You can actually buy just for playing teachable perks from dlc survivors etc. but still cant play them.
         You can sometimes found nice players playing as killers that know how is the matchmaking situation so they let u farm and sometimes even a win. :) 

New player does not have any word or chance in this game. To get good u need to grind and learn all perks. If u think u will come to this game and in 30 mins u got it u will be very mistaken. But if u like to teach all that perks that are in the game, u like grind or have friends to play with, this game is just made for you,

I will continue my journey in this game and maybe change from thumb down to thumb up or I will add more CONS this game have.

I am giving this game 4/10 coz it has been a fun from a start. How I said, I will maybe change it later. Have a good day.

Edit: After getting to green rank and little bit of practice I found out this game more and more funnier. So I am changing the my review from thumb down to thumb up. And giving this game 7/10. And ur asking why? 3 points down for that I have almost every perk on survivor I want and survivors are mostly only reskins. So after you get all perks u want you will  farm one survivor that is small and quiet (you wont main David King or Bill). U will use Claudette instead because she is darker and match the enviroment. So buying survivors is usseles. If your F2P player like me and you like playing killers GL because how I said when you get your favourute killer to 50 its still gona take a lot of time to get 9000 IS. Next lost point is because of toxic player and DCs. You kill somebody twice and right after that he will write bad comment on your profile. And the last. Some of the killer need changer or small buffs that could help them and addons. 7/10 game. I definitelly recommend buying.

Edit 2: MORI ME DADDY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

So heres the thing- it is one of, if not the most, infuriating game ive personally played. Killers face camp and there is so many hooks it is impossible to wiggle out of their grip.

BUT its one of those games where you cant help but go back and play more. 

Just- make sure to play killer if your playing solo since random survivors usually go every man for himself and don't play as a team...
